  sname
  allowBlank
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  TextField
  sdefault
  true
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@

<tt>true</tt>)
#$@text#$@

  LallowDecimals

  LallowNegative
